portfolio.stock.model

Interface UserPortfolios

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserPortfoliosImpl

    public interface UserPortfolios
    Represents a model for the stock MVC application. It provides different operation for the user to use in creating, maintaining and querying the portfolios.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buyStocks(java.lang.String portfolioName, java.lang.String ticker, double price, java.lang.String date, StockData data)
      Used to get the stock to be bought and add it to the specified portfolio.
      void createPortfolio(java.lang.String name)
      Used to create a portfolio with the specified name.
      double getTotalCostBasis(java.lang.String date)
      Returns the total cost basis value of all the portfolio at the specified date.
      double getTotalValue(java.lang.String date)
      Returns the total value of all the portfolio at the specified date.
      java.lang.String portfolioContents(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Used to get the specified portfolio contents.

    • Method Detail

      • createPortfolio

        void createPortfolio(java.lang.String name)
        Used to create a portfolio with the specified name. Names have to be unique, no two portfolio can have the same name. Names are case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the portfolio to be created.

      • buyStocks

        void buyStocks(java.lang.String portfolioName,
               java.lang.String ticker,
               double price,
               java.lang.String date,
               StockData data)
        Used to get the stock to be bought and add it to the specified portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - represents the portfolio to which stock is to be added.
        ticker - the label of the stock to be added.
        price - the price of the stock to be added.
        date - th date at which the stock was bought.
        data - the data object from which the stock data is to be got.

      • getTotalValue

        double getTotalValue(java.lang.String date)
        Returns the total value of all the portfolio at the specified date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date at which the total value of the stock is to be calculated.
        Returns:
        the total value of the stock at the specified date.

      • getTotalCostBasis

        double getTotalCostBasis(java.lang.String date)
        Returns the total cost basis value of all the portfolio at the specified date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date at which the total cost basis value of the stock is to be calculated.
        Returns:
        the total cost basis value of the stock at the specified date.

      • portfolioContents

        java.lang.String portfolioContents(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Used to get the specified portfolio contents.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the portfolio whose contents are to be displayed.
        Returns:
        the portfolio name, the stocks data in the specified portfolio.
